House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00074
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING SPECIAL EDUCATION (SPED) CENTERS FOR CHILDREN WITH SPECIAL NEEDS IN ALL PUBLIC SCHOOLS DIVISIONS, PROVIDING FOR STANDARDS AND GUIDELINES, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
SHORT TITLE : Special Education (sped) Centers Act
ABSTRACT : Seeks to establish special education (SPED) centers in all regular schools – at least one (1) SPED center for each school division and at least three (3) SPED centers in big school divisions and provides for the effective implementation of inclusive education.
